  <title>mn_county_boundaries_1000</title>
  <abstract>Minnesota county boundaries derived from a combination of 1:24,000 scale PLS lines, 1:100,000 scale TIGER, 1:100,000 scale DLG, and 1:24,000 scale hydrography lines. At the time of its development (1993), the largest available scale data were assembled to create the layer.

This layer exists to facilitate integration between county and PLS data sets. Used also as the basis for county-based tiling schemes with DNR's GIS Core datbase. The state border contained within the layer is used in numerous DNR data sets.

Statewide</abstract>
